original_title: Video Cop: Bring Me the Blood of the Werewolf
overview: Jake finds himself in a medieval village, which is possessed by the most iconic cavalcade of movie monsters: Count Dracula, Frankensteinâ€™s Monster and The Mummy! To make things even worse, Jake is hunted down by an angry mob when the light of the full moon transforms him into a bloodthirsty Werewolf! With the help of lovely lady Claudia, Jakewolf plunges into an orgy of terror to battle the Prince of darkness and his evil minions.
title: Bring Me the Blood of the Werewolf
